headline: PayPal to Add Stablecoin on Stellar Network
summary: PayPal recently announced plans to make the PayPal USD (PYUSD) stablecoin available on the Stellar network pending regulatory approval. PayPal plans to integrate its stablecoin into more of its products this year. Stellar Development Foundation CEO Denelle Dixon has more on the story.

headline: Could Buying PayPal Stock Today Set You Up for Life?
summary: PayPal is introducing improved features and attracting new users.  PayPal stock is trading below its three-year averages.  It hasn't been easy to be a PayPal Holdings (NASDAQ: PYPL) shareholder during the past few years.
